SELECT inquiry_num, member_nickname, inquiry_type, inquiry_title, inquiry_state, inquiry_regdate FROM (SELECT inquiry_num, inquiry_title, MEMBER.member_num, inquiry_type, inquiry_state, inquiry_regdate, member_nickname, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY INQUIRY_REGDATE DESC) AS rNum FROM INQUIRY JOIN MEMBER USING (member_num)) ADINQU WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY inquiry_regdate DESC
SELECT COUNT(inquiry_num) FROM inquiry

SELECT pay_num, member_num, member_nickname, club_name, pay_method, pay_date, pay_amount FROM (SELECT PAYMENT.pay_num, MEMBER.member_num, MEMBER.member_nickname, CLUB.club_name, PAYMENT.pay_method, PAYMENT.pay_date, PAYMENT.pay_amount, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY pay_num DESC) AS rNum FROM PAYMENT LEFT JOIN CLUB ON CLUB.club_num = PAYMENT.club_num LEFT JOIN MEMBER ON PAYMENT.member_num = MEMBER.member_num) ADPAY WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY pay_num DESC
SELECT COUNT(pay_num) FROM PAYMENT

SELECT club_num, club_category, club_name, club_leader, club_kind, club_onoff, club_startdate, club_enddate FROM (SELECT club_num, club_category, club_name, club_leader, club_kind, club_onoff, club_startdate, club_enddate, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY club_num DESC) AS rNum FROM CLUB) ADCLUB WHERE rNum BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY club_num DESC
